org.fluentjava.reflection
Class ObjectClassMethods

java.lang.Object
  org.fluentjava.reflection.ObjectClassMethods

public class ObjectClassMethods
extends Object

Class that tells if a method has was inherited from object (ignoring overriding). Mostly used on Coercing to closures the interfaces that have Object methods on their signature (such as Comparator).

Constructor Summary
ObjectClassMethods()
           
 
Method Summary
 List<Method> filterObjectMethods(Method... methods)
          Filters the arguments into list of the methods that are from Object class.
 boolean fromObject(Method method)
          Says if a method has the same signature of a method defined on the class Object.
